name: Cosmicats
description:
Music and Story by @sammneiland

Art by @Rinska

Code by @Akimbo

Two city cats staring at the night sky on a power outage, sharing the stories they see in the ocean above.

  • Left click and hold to move
  • Double click to flip
  • Right click and hold to rotate
  • F12 to toggle fullscreen

Screen movement is slightly smoother on downloadable version, but otherwise web version is identical.

OST on Youtube!

Developed over ~41 hours for the GMTK 2021 game jam.
